import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { AppServiceService } from 'src/app/services/app-service.service'; import {ActivatedRoute} from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-details', templateUrl: './user-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-details.component.css'] }) export class UserDetailsComponent { details: any; repos: any; constructor(private service: AppServiceService, private router: Router, private route: ActivatedRoute,) { } ngOnInit(){ let username = this.route.snapshot.queryParamMap.get('userLogin'); this.getDetails(username); } getDetails(username: any){ this.service.userDetails(username).subscribe( (res => { console.log(res); this.details = res; }) ); } getRepos(username: any){ this.service.userRepos(username).subscribe( (res => { console.log(res); this.repos = res; }) ); } }
